title: Solitaire Master - Pro (by Ruben Reboredo)
author: SolitaireMaster_Dev

siteName: TouchArcade - iPhone, iPad, Android Games Forum
text: Solitaire Master - Pro Solitaire Master is a free collection of more than 120 solitaires that includes the most popular and fun solitaires, wit… DetailsSolitaire Master is a free collection of more than 120 solitaires that includes the most popular and fun solitaires, with impeccable graphics and animations and a unique gaming experience. Relax and exercise your mind playing Classic Solitaire (Solitaire, Patience or Klondike), Freecell, Spider, Pyramid, and other tremendously challenging and fun solitaires that will make you enjoy for hundreds of hours. If you want to relax like in an ASMR session, choose your favorite solitaire and enjoy the smooth sounds and animations and a fantastic gaming experience. And if you like challenges, try all the available solitaires, win achievements and beat other players' scores and times. IMPORTANT NOTE: Unlocking content and playing offline. Solitaire Master has in-app purchases, but all content can be unlocked for free by earning rewards by winning solitaires. The only thing that cannot be unlocked for free is advertising, I feel that it is the only way to reward the huge work behind this game and to continue improving it day by day. The game can be played offline, but I would like advertising to be enabled (it is not intrusive) to thank the hard work behind the game. MAIN FEATURES: - More than 90 solitaires in one app, including Classic Solitaire (Klondike or Patience), FreeCell, Spider, Pyramid, TriPeaks, Yukon, Scorpion, Canfield, Forty Thieves, Aces Up and many others coming soon Solitario Clásico (Klondike or Patience), Carta Blanca (FreeCell), Spider, Pyramid, TriPeaks, Yukon, Scorpion, Canfield, Forty Thieves, Aces Up - Detailed instructions for each game - Play with one tap, double-tap and drag and drop - Option to use gestures as a shortcut to the most used actions - Auto play on obvious moves - Game recording for each solitaire - Undo and redo moves (unlimited) - Hints (one at a time or all together) - Relaxing sound effects - Amazing victory animations - Time, move and score counters - Statistics of each game - Filtering of solitaires (favourites, duration, difficulty, chances of victory...) - Personalization of the background, decks, card backs... - Card size and margins in each game customized - Multiple card layouts in each game (tableau piles, foundations…) - For phones and tablets and in landscape or portrait format - Game Center support - Achievements and leaderboards - Rewards to unlock all content (games, graphic improvements...) for free - Languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, French and Russian - Free - Offline game Solitaire Master is the successor to Solitaire Collection (Premium and Lite), a collection of solitaires with over 10 years of excellent rating. In this new version, developed from scratch, all the suggestions of hundreds of users and many options seen in other games have been implemented with the aim of creating one of the best collections of solitaires with poker cards. Solitaire Master is ideal for people looking for a classic and simple game and for those who want to customize everything, changing the game background, decks, card backs, game layouts and many other options. It adapts to any type of device (mobile phones or tablets) by adjusting the layout and size of the cards in each solitaire to the one that provides the best gaming experience. It is classic, simple but very customizable, elegant, beautiful, extremely relaxing and ideal to exercise your mind while enjoying a unique gaming experience. But beware, it is very addictive. Try it and you will fall in love!! I assure you. TouchArcade Rating:Unrated Compatibility:HD Universal If you like solitaires, you must try Solitaire Master, you won't regret it... I am an indie developer and after more than 2 years of work, I have published this new collection of solitaires, to replace Solitaire Collection (Lite and Premium versions) that have been in the Play Store for more than 10 years getting excellent reviews. In Solitaire Master I have included solitaires of all kinds (currently about 90 different types) and I have tried to implement all the ideas that I liked after trying more than a hundred solitaire games. It is perfect both for casual players and for the most demanding ones, since it allows you to configure each game to your liking. With Solitaire Master all the details have been taken care of, but above all, an optimal gaming experience has been achieved. You will have hundreds of hours of relaxation and fun. Solitaire Master is the perfect companion anywhere, anytime. Solitaire Master will continue to improve little by little with the addition of new solitaires, graphic resources and new functions for a long time. If you love solitaires, you have to try it!! It is available for iOS in the AppStore: Solitaire Master - App Store And it is available for android in Google Play Store: Solitaire Master - Google Play Store And now Solitaire Master is available to play online! Enjoy over 130 solitaire games on your desktop or mobile device. https://playsolitairemaster.com I would like to know your feedback to continue improving Solitaire Master. Enjoy Solitaire Master!! A new version of Solitaire Master has been released: - Added the solitaires American Toad, Royal Marriage, Autumn Leaves, Panoramic Klondike - Added an option to configure screen rotation: automatic rotation, portrait mode, and landscape mode (at the moment only in the Android version) - Added 4 new victory animations - Added solitaire features on the screen where the rules are displayed All new features are interesting but the most interesting thing is the Panoramic Klondike solitaire, a wonderful variant of the classic Klondike (3 cards) that I assure you don't know. Panoramic Klondike is the brainchild of Paul Vandervoort, a user of my old Solitaire Collection and now a Solitaire Master user. He is a great fan of the classic Klondike and after hundreds of games, he thought of this fantastic variant, which in my point of view improves it enormously. After contacting me to tell me about the idea, I found it very interesting and I decided to implement it in Solitaire Master. Below I quote verbatim how Paul defines Panoramic Klondike: "Panoramic Klondike is for players who enjoy the strategizing aspect, but not the memorization aspect of the game. The rules are the same, and your chance of winning is the same. The only difference is the deck (or source/waste) is laid out so you can see it all at once. This way, you can see your options more clearly, and game play goes faster. As with regular Klondike, you can't go backwards through the deck after you've taken a card from it. You have to tap the spinning-arrows icon, which will reorder the deck so you can do another pass". The description is very clear. With Panoramic Klondike you enjoy the classic Klondike but without worrying about memorizing the cards that you leave behind in the discard pile and without having to calculate by heart the cards that will appear in the next pass. I hope you enjoy this new version of Solitaire Master and this amazing variant of the classic Klondike. You can download Solitaire Master for Android (Google Play) and for iOS (App Store) Solitaire Master - Google Play Store Solitaire Master - App Store The game seems to be crashing immediately on start up. iPhone 11 iOS 15.2. Sorry. It may be an issue with screen rotation for versions older than iOS 16. I just uploaded a new version, I guess it will be available for download in a couple of hours. Please confirm to me when you try the new version that it works correctly. Thank you and sorry for the mistake. It works now! Thank you for your quick response. Hi everyone A new version of Solitaire Master has been published including the following improvements: - Added 3 new solitaires: Rectangular Rovers, Spanish Patience, Line Up - Added 4 new decks (including 2 decks with 4 colors each), optimized for phones (large numbers and suits) and for tablets (classic decks) - Added 1 new backcard - Access the Facebook page directly from the Settings screen - Option to rate Solitaire Master from within the app Any feedback or improvement request will be welcome. I hope you like it! You can download Solitaire Master for Android (Google Play) and for iOS (App Store) Solitaire Master - Google Play Store Solitaire Master - App Store Hi everyone. A new version of Solitaire Master has been released: - Added 2 new solitaire games: Maze, Fortune’s Favor - Introduced 4 new card backs and 4 new tableau marks - Fixed an issue that initially selected a wrong deck when running on mobile phones - Modified the main deck, clarifying its appearance and enhancing resolution - Minor bugs fixed The Solitaire Master presentation video and screenshots have also been updated. You can download Solitaire Master for Android (Google Play) and for iOS (App Store) Solitaire Master - Google Play Store Solitaire Master - App Store Hi everyone. A new version of Solitaire Master has been released: - Added 6 new solitaires: Thirteens, House on the Hill, Beehive, Saratoga, Fifteen Puzzle, Agnes Sorel - New option to gray out cards that are not available to play (disabled by default) - Fixed bugs in Klondike (Panoramic) and Penguin rules - (Only in android version) Added option to show the status bar and the system navigation bar - Improved the "hints" and "play with one tap" in several solitaires. - Minor bugs fixed. Any feedback will be welcome. And if you have a favorite solitaire that you can't find in Solitaire Master, you can request it and it will be added in future versions. I hope you like it! I attach the download links in case anyone wants to try it.: Solitaire Master (iOS): https://apps.apple.com/app/id6444720973 Solitaire Master (Android): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.rrl.solitaire.master.pro A new version of Solitaire Master has been released (v. 1.2.0): - Added 8 new solitaires: Aces Square, Ali Baba, Curds and Whey, Fan, Martha, Osmosis, Persian Rug, Queen of Italy, - Minor bugs fixed. Any feedback will be welcome. And if you have a favorite solitaire that you can't find in Solitaire Master, you can request it and it will be added in future versions. I hope you like it! I attach the download links in case anyone wants to try it.: Solitaire Master (iOS): https://apps.apple.com/app/id6444720973 Solitaire Master (Android): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.rrl.solitaire.master.pro A new version of Solitaire Master has been released (v. 1.2.1): - Added 6 new solitaires: Kings in the Corners, Ants, Snail, Whitehead, Baker's Game, Microbe - The rules of all solitaire games have been rewritten - Fixed Eight Off solitaire rules - Minor bug fixes Any feedback will be welcome. And if you have a favorite solitaire that you can't find in Solitaire Master, you can request it and it will be added in future versions. I hope you like it! I attach the download links in case anyone wants to try it.: Solitaire Master (iOS): https://apps.apple.com/app/id6444720973 Solitaire Master (Android): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.rrl.solitaire.master.pro Share This Page
html:
1. Solitaire Master - Pro

    Solitaire Master is a free collection of more than 120 solitaires that includes the most popular and fun solitaires, wit…
    Details
    Solitaire Master is a free collection of more than 120 solitaires that includes the most popular and fun solitaires, with impeccable graphics and animations and a unique gaming experience. Relax and exercise your mind playing Classic Solitaire (Solitaire, Patience or Klondike), Freecell, Spider, Pyramid, and other tremendously challenging and fun solitaires that will make you enjoy for hundreds of hours. If you want to relax like in an ASMR session, choose your favorite solitaire and enjoy the smooth sounds and animations and a fantastic gaming experience. And if you like challenges, try all the available solitaires, win achievements and beat other players' scores and times. IMPORTANT NOTE: Unlocking content and playing offline. Solitaire Master has in-app purchases, but all content can be unlocked for free by earning rewards by winning solitaires. The only thing that cannot be unlocked for free is advertising, I feel that it is the only way to reward the huge work behind this game and to continue improving it day by day. The game can be played offline, but I would like advertising to be enabled (it is not intrusive) to thank the hard work behind the game. MAIN FEATURES: - More than 90 solitaires in one app, including Classic Solitaire (Klondike or Patience), FreeCell, Spider, Pyramid, TriPeaks, Yukon, Scorpion, Canfield, Forty Thieves, Aces Up and many others coming soon Solitario Clásico (Klondike or Patience), Carta Blanca (FreeCell), Spider, Pyramid, TriPeaks, Yukon, Scorpion, Canfield, Forty Thieves, Aces Up - Detailed instructions for each game - Play with one tap, double-tap and drag and drop - Option to use gestures as a shortcut to the most used actions - Auto play on obvious moves - Game recording for each solitaire - Undo and redo moves (unlimited) - Hints (one at a time or all together) - Relaxing sound effects - Amazing victory animations - Time, move and score counters - Statistics of each game - Filtering of solitaires (favourites, duration, difficulty, chances of victory...) - Personalization of the background, decks, card backs... - Card size and margins in each game customized - Multiple card layouts in each game (tableau piles, foundations…) - For phones and tablets and in landscape or portrait format - Game Center support - Achievements and leaderboards - Rewards to unlock all content (games, graphic improvements...) for free - Languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, French and Russian - Free - Offline game Solitaire Master is the successor to Solitaire Collection (Premium and Lite), a collection of solitaires with over 10 years of excellent rating. In this new version, developed from scratch, all the suggestions of hundreds of users and many options seen in other games have been implemented with the aim of creating one of the best collections of solitaires with poker cards. Solitaire Master is ideal for people looking for a classic and simple game and for those who want to customize everything, changing the game background, decks, card backs, game layouts and many other options. It adapts to any type of device (mobile phones or tablets) by adjusting the layout and size of the cards in each solitaire to the one that provides the best gaming experience. It is classic, simple but very customizable, elegant, beautiful, extremely relaxing and ideal to exercise your mind while enjoying a unique gaming experience. But beware, it is very addictive. Try it and you will fall in love!! I assure you.
    TouchArcade Rating:Unrated
    Compatibility:HD Universal

    If you like solitaires, you must try Solitaire Master, you won't regret it...

    I am an indie developer and after more than 2 years of work, I have published this new collection of solitaires, to replace Solitaire Collection (Lite and Premium versions) that have been in the Play Store for more than 10 years getting excellent reviews.

    In Solitaire Master I have included solitaires of all kinds (currently about 90 different types) and I have tried to implement all the ideas that I liked after trying more than a hundred solitaire games. It is perfect both for casual players and for the most demanding ones, since it allows you to configure each game to your liking. With Solitaire Master all the details have been taken care of, but above all, an optimal gaming experience has been achieved.

    You will have hundreds of hours of relaxation and fun. Solitaire Master is the perfect companion anywhere, anytime.

    Solitaire Master will continue to improve little by little with the addition of new solitaires, graphic resources and new functions for a long time.

    If you love solitaires, you have to try it!!

    It is available for iOS in the AppStore:
    Solitaire Master - App Store

    And it is available for android in Google Play Store:
    Solitaire Master - Google Play Store

    And now Solitaire Master is available to play online! Enjoy over 130 solitaire games on your desktop or mobile device.

    https://playsolitairemaster.com

    I would like to know your feedback to continue improving Solitaire Master.

    Enjoy Solitaire Master!!

  2. A new version of Solitaire Master has been released:

    - Added the solitaires American Toad, Royal Marriage, Autumn Leaves, Panoramic Klondike
    - Added an option to configure screen rotation: automatic rotation, portrait mode, and landscape mode (at the moment only in the Android version)
    - Added 4 new victory animations
    - Added solitaire features on the screen where the rules are displayed

    All new features are interesting but the most interesting thing is the Panoramic Klondike solitaire, a wonderful variant of the classic Klondike (3 cards) that I assure you don't know.

    Panoramic Klondike is the brainchild of Paul Vandervoort, a user of my old Solitaire Collection and now a Solitaire Master user. He is a great fan of the classic Klondike and after hundreds of games, he thought of this fantastic variant, which in my point of view improves it enormously. After contacting me to tell me about the idea, I found it very interesting and I decided to implement it in Solitaire Master. Below I quote verbatim how Paul defines Panoramic Klondike:

    "Panoramic Klondike is for players who enjoy the strategizing aspect, but not the memorization aspect of the game. The rules are the same, and your chance of winning is the same. The only difference is the deck (or source/waste) is laid out so you can see it all at once. This way, you can see your options more clearly, and game play goes faster. As with regular Klondike, you can't go backwards through the deck after you've taken a card from it. You have to tap the spinning-arrows icon, which will reorder the deck so you can do another pass".

    The description is very clear. With Panoramic Klondike you enjoy the classic Klondike but without worrying about memorizing the cards that you leave behind in the discard pile and without having to calculate by heart the cards that will appear in the next pass.

    I hope you enjoy this new version of Solitaire Master and this amazing variant of the classic Klondike.

    You can download Solitaire Master for Android (Google Play) and for iOS (App Store)

    Solitaire Master - Google Play Store

    Solitaire Master - App Store

  3. The game seems to be crashing immediately on start up. iPhone 11 iOS 15.2.

  4. Sorry. It may be an issue with screen rotation for versions older than iOS 16.
    I just uploaded a new version, I guess it will be available for download in a couple of hours.
    Please confirm to me when you try the new version that it works correctly. Thank you and sorry for the mistake.
  5. It works now! Thank you for your quick response.

  6. Hi everyone

    A new version of Solitaire Master has been published including the following improvements:

    - Added 3 new solitaires: Rectangular Rovers, Spanish Patience, Line Up
    - Added 4 new decks (including 2 decks with 4 colors each), optimized for phones (large numbers and suits) and for tablets (classic decks)
    - Added 1 new backcard
    - Access the Facebook page directly from the Settings screen
    - Option to rate Solitaire Master from within the app

    Any feedback or improvement request will be welcome.

    I hope you like it!

    You can download Solitaire Master for Android (Google Play) and for iOS (App Store)

    Solitaire Master - Google Play Store

    Solitaire Master - App Store

  7. Hi everyone.

    A new version of Solitaire Master has been released:

    - Added 2 new solitaire games: Maze, Fortune’s Favor
    - Introduced 4 new card backs and 4 new tableau marks
    - Fixed an issue that initially selected a wrong deck when running on mobile phones
    - Modified the main deck, clarifying its appearance and enhancing resolution
    - Minor bugs fixed

    The Solitaire Master presentation video and screenshots have also been updated.

    You can download Solitaire Master for Android (Google Play) and for iOS (App Store)

    Solitaire Master - Google Play Store

    Solitaire Master - App Store

  9. Hi everyone.

    A new version of Solitaire Master has been released:

    - Added 6 new solitaires: Thirteens, House on the Hill, Beehive, Saratoga, Fifteen Puzzle, Agnes Sorel
    - New option to gray out cards that are not available to play (disabled by default)
    - Fixed bugs in Klondike (Panoramic) and Penguin rules
    - (Only in android version) Added option to show the status bar and the system navigation bar
    - Improved the "hints" and "play with one tap" in several solitaires.
    - Minor bugs fixed.

    Any feedback will be welcome. And if you have a favorite solitaire that you can't find in Solitaire Master, you can request it and it will be added in future versions.
    I hope you like it!

    I attach the download links in case anyone wants to try it.:

    Solitaire Master (iOS): https://apps.apple.com/app/id6444720973
    Solitaire Master (Android): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.rrl.solitaire.master.pro

  10. A new version of Solitaire Master has been released (v. 1.2.0):

    - Added 8 new solitaires: Aces Square, Ali Baba, Curds and Whey, Fan, Martha, Osmosis, Persian Rug, Queen of Italy,
    - Minor bugs fixed.

    Any feedback will be welcome. And if you have a favorite solitaire that you can't find in Solitaire Master, you can request it and it will be added in future versions.
    I hope you like it!

    I attach the download links in case anyone wants to try it.:

    Solitaire Master (iOS): https://apps.apple.com/app/id6444720973
    Solitaire Master (Android): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.rrl.solitaire.master.pro

  11. A new version of Solitaire Master has been released (v. 1.2.1):

    - Added 6 new solitaires: Kings in the Corners, Ants, Snail, Whitehead, Baker's Game, Microbe
    - The rules of all solitaire games have been rewritten
    - Fixed Eight Off solitaire rules
    - Minor bug fixes

    Any feedback will be welcome. And if you have a favorite solitaire that you can't find in Solitaire Master, you can request it and it will be added in future versions.
    I hope you like it!

    I attach the download links in case anyone wants to try it.:

    Solitaire Master (iOS): https://apps.apple.com/app/id6444720973
    Solitaire Master (Android): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.rrl.solitaire.master.pro
